attributes.action: run the country according to the wishes of the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abraham Lincoln defined the role of a democratic government as governing "of the people, by the people, and FOR the people".  The missing element in England is the "FOR" - the current government is not listening to its population on many issues such as fuel tax, over burdensome equailty laws, NHS issues etc.  We call on Prime Minister to officially seek public opinion through referenda etc so that the wishes of the people are carried out.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for specific action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
